title: The Home Handyman - January/February 2016 (gnv64)
description:

FEATURES

43 Woodworkers profile - Hennie Ackermann, proves that you donâ€™t need a workshop filled with tools to enjoy woodworking
44 Car-care tips - Keep the exterior of your vehicle in tip-top condition
46 Screwdrivers, screws and bits - Save yourself the aggravation of stripped screws by using the correct driver
50 Dishwasher care - Ensure dishwasher longevity with routine maintenance

REGULARS
